```{r}
set.seed(1)
dta <- expand.grid(
  id = rep(letters[1:10]),
  t = c(1:2)
)
dta[, 'value'] <- runif(n = nrow(dta))
head(dta)

library('ggplot2')
ggplot(
  data = dta, aes(x = factor(t), y = value)
) +
  geom_line(aes(group = id), size = 1.2) +
  labs(x = 'Time', y = 'Measurement') +
  theme(
    text = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks = element_blank(),
    panel.grid = element_blank()
  )
